title: Murder by the Glass
description: Life is sweet for Nikki Sands. Shes toasting her new job at Malveaux Estate in Napa Valley and balancing a love triangle with a neighboring winemaker and her boss, vineyard owner Derek Malveauxthe catch of the county. And tonight, Nikki will be on the arm of Napas golden boy at a Sonoma mansion for the wedding of the decade... Nikkis friend Isabel agreed to cater the weddingbefore she learned that the groom was her cheating lover. After the ceremony, Isabel asks Nikki to bring the obnoxious bride another glass of wine. But Nikki finds the new wife sprawled on the floormurdered. Since the dear departed made enemies easily, theres a bushel of suspectsmany of them close to Nikki. Now, its up to her to get to the bottom of what may have been a killer bottle of wine.
author: Michele Scott
